author: CT Phipps
description:
The World Below by Matthew Dawkins, Diana DiMicco, Chant Evans, Kim Godwin, Ed Greenwood, Danielle Lauzon, Travis Legge, Michele Masala, and Leath Sheales is a self-contained dark fantasy tabletop roleplaying game. The premise is many races inhabit a vast underground setting (the titular World Below) and they must fight for survival in a complicated network […]

title: REVIEW: The World Below
